message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a price of $13000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you is $15000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this price?

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of a price that's closer to the value you place on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12500. It's a fair price considering the value you've mentioned.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $11750. Can you consider this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $13500. I think it's a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product and the negotiations we've had so far.
